isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - long sleeper b-pillar SIDE TRIM PANEL

svcproc.title: long sleeper b-pillar SIDE TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install B-Pillar Side Trim Panel on Long Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 76
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install passenger side B-pillar side trim panel (Item 6) in sleeper cab.
Install seven push-in fasteners (Items 4 and 5) to secure it to cab wall and passenger side middle side panel (Item 7), passenger side shown.
Position shoulder belt (Item 2) in place on passenger side B-pillar side trim panel (Item 6) and install torx head bolt (Item 1), passenger side shown. Tighten to 20 to 25 Lbf-ft (27 to 34 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install driver side B-pillar side trim panel on sleeper cab.
